# NumberFormatError class

Base class for errors. In addition to a `code` and a human-friendly `message`<!-- -->, may also includes the token `stem` as well as other fields.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class NumberFormatError extends Error 
```
<b>Extends:</b> Error

## Remarks

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `NumberFormatError` class.
